description: Retrieves a comprehensive list of all country ISO ALPHA-3 codes as defined by the ISO 3166 international standard. These codes are essential for populating the country field during the creation or update of a user.
Retrieves a list of existing end-users with their corresponding data.

queryParameters.name: page_number
queryParameters.description: Specifies the page number from which the request will start.

queryParameters.name: page_size
queryParameters.description: Specifies the number of items displayed per page in the paginated result.

queryParameters.name: date_from
queryParameters.description: Formats Accepts: ["YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"] , The maximum interval is 90 days, depending on the date_to value.

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Specifies the credit limit for the end-user.

queryParameters.name: spread
queryParameters.description: Specifies the spread added to the quote for the end-user.

queryParameters.name: document_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of the personal document.

queryParameters.name: tax_domicile
queryParameters.description: Specifies the tax domicile of the end-user.

description: Retrieves data pertaining to an existing end-user.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

queryParameters.name: name
queryParameters.description: Specifies the name of the end-user.

queryParameters.name: tax_identification
queryParameters.description: Specifies the number of the personal document of the end-user.

description: Updates an existing end-user data by applying the provided parameters.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

description: Toggles the activation status of an existing end-user, either activating or deactivating as per the request.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

pathParameters.name: is_enabled
pathParameters.description: Specifies if the end-user is enabled or not.

description: Initiates the process of resetting the password for an existing end-user.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Specifies the name of the end-user.

fields.name: email
fields.description: Specifies the email address associated with the end-user.

fields.name: country
fields.description: Specifies the ISO ALPHA-3 country code for the end-user. These codes can be retrieved using the 'Get Country (ISO ALPHA-3 Codes) List' endpoint.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: Specifies the phone number associated with the end-user.

fields.name: details
fields.description: Specifies additional details about the end-user.

fields.name: tax_domicile
fields.description: Specifies the tax domicile of the end-user.

fields.name: limit
fields.description: Specifies the credit limit for the end-user.

description: Creates a new end-user by passing the same parameters that are required in the UI of the Parfin Platform.
